wikipedia_page.main: James Smetham (9 September 1821 – 5 February 1889) was an English Pre-Raphaelite Brotherhood painter and engraver, a follower of Dante Gabriel Rossetti.

response: Naboth in his Vineyard, (1856) an oil painting by James Smetham held by Tate Britain.
* James Smetham, Pre-Raphaelite Brotherhood painter, engraver and follower of Dante Gabriel Rossetti
